QuestData.Title: Vengeance for Our Soldiers
QuestData.Description: 7th Legion... They rushed us in the dead of the night. Their captain barked orders as the submariners slaughtered my men. Then he came to me, put his face in mine, and said something I'll never forget:$B$B"The name's Master Sergeant Pietro Zaren, officer in the 7th Legion. When you see your soldiers being slaughtered in your nightmares - if you even still dream - remember my name and tremble."$B$BAvenge my soldiers! Kill the 7th Legion occupying the Cathedral Quarter of Gilneas City, southwest of here.
QuestData.CompletionText: The 7th Legion must pay for what they did!
QuestData.RewardText: Though we were shamed in battle, the enemy was not victorious. I will not soon forget this, $n.$B$BIf I make it back to Silverpine I will likely retire from the service. War is not in my blood.
